column2: PAPABEAR THIS IS ALPHA BLACK. MAYDAY MAYDAY BLACKHAWK DOWN SOUTHWEST OF MONTIGNAC, MAYDAY MAYDAY.
ALPHA BLACK THIS IS PAPABEAR. HOLD TIGHT WE HAVE SAR PACKAGE ENROUTE. OVER.
WE CAN SEE YOU BRAVO BLACK. SIGNALLING POSIT WITH GREEN SMOKE. COME TO PICK US UP. OVER.
GOLF BLACK YOU ARE CLEARED TO DEMOLISH THE DOWNED HELO. PROCEED WITH CAUTION. OVER.
